exceptions.tactic: apply filterlim_comp_2 with (h := fun x y => plus x y).

The reference Hseriesa was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hseriesb was not found in the current environment.

In environment a : nat -> R n : nat H : forall k : nat, (k < n)%nat -> a k = 0 H0 : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V) (h : ?U -> ?V -> ?W), filterlim f ?F ?G0 -> filterlim g ?F ?H -> filterlim (fun x : ?U * ?V => h (fst x) (snd x)) (filter_prod ?G0 ?H) ?I -> filterlim (fun x : ?T => h (f x) (g x)) ?F ?I X : ?G -> ?G -> ?G Unable to unify "forall P : ?V0 -> Prop, locally (plus ?M3034 ?M3035) P -> filtermap (fun z : ?V0 * ?V0 => plus (fst z) (snd z)) (filter_prod (locally ?M3034) (locally ?M3035)) P" with "Series a = Series (fun k : nat => a (n + k)%nat)".

original: intros Hseriesa Hseriesb. apply filterlim_comp_2 with (h := fun x y => plus x y). apply Hseriesa. apply Hseriesb. apply filterlim_plus.
